name: Trail Run (Goji Play)
description:
Transform your exercise equipment into a pleasant jog through the colorful world of Blue Goji’s Trail Run!

Keep pace along with your trusty, 4-legged running companion as you dip and dodge through the forest. Take alternate paths that push you harder. Trail Run drives you through your work-out and keeps you motivated and entertained.

*** For a better user experience connect using GojiPlay Hardware.
